sourcesContent:
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, ElementRef, OnInit, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { MoviesLService } from '../services/movies-l.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-movie-detail', templateUrl: './movie-detail.component.html', styleUrls: ['./movie-detail.component.css'] }) export class MovieDetailComponent implements OnInit{ @ViewChild('modal') modal:ElementRef |undefined MovieSimiler: any[] = []; movieDetail:any; movieId:any; movieG:any; movieImg:any; movieCasts:any; movieCrew:any; movieVideos:any; movieTrailer:any; movieTrailerKey:number | undefined; youtubeEmbedUrl:any; // data of backdrops images movieBackdropImages:any // data of logo images movieLogoImages:any; // data of posters images moviePosterImages4:any // similar data similarMovies:any; constructor(private http:HttpClient,private activte:ActivatedRoute,private movieD:MoviesLService,private router:Router){ this.activte.params.subscribe((params)=>{ this.movieId=params['id']; }) } ngOnInit(): void { // to get movie details this.movieD.getMovieDetail(this.movieId).subscribe((data:any)=>{ this.movieDetail=data this.movieG=data.genres this.movieImg=data.backdrop_path }) // to get movie cast details this.movieD.getMovieCast(this.movieId).subscribe((data)=>{ this.movieCasts=data.cast this.movieCrew=data.crew }) // to get movie videos this.movieD.getMovieVideos(this.movieId).subscribe((data)=>{ this.movieVideos=data.results this.movieTrailer = this.movieVideos.filter((video:any) => video.type === "Trailer"); console.log("trailer",this.movieTrailer) console.log("trailer video",this.movieTrailer[0].key ) this.movieTrailerKey= this.movieTrailer[0].key this.youtubeEmbedUrl='https://www.youtube.com/embed/'+this.movieTrailerKey console.log(this.movieTrailerKey) }) // to get movies images this.movieD.getMovieBackdrops(this.movieId).subscribe((data)=>{ this.movieBackdropImages=data.backdrops this.movieLogoImages=data.logos this.moviePosterImages4=data.posters.slice(0,4) }) // to get the similar movies details this.movieD.getSimilarData(this.movieId).subscribe((data)=>{ this.similarMovies=data.results }) this.movieD.getSimilarData(this.movieId).subscribe((data:any)=>{ this.MovieSimiler=data.results }) } navigate(movieId:any):void{ this.router.navigate(['/details',movieId]); } }
